description:
From multi-day trips to thru-hikes, carry your gear in ventilated comfort. The trampoline back panel keeps your back dry and load balanced through rough trail sections. Access options help keep you organized, no need to pull everything out to get your snacks or sunscreen. Plus, it's designed with recycled materials and a PFC-free water-repellent coating to reduce its environmental impact.

  • Female-specific FreeFloat suspension system is light, dynamic and breathable
  • Kalmia 60 Plus is adjusted to provide fit and comfort to suit a wide range of body types
  • 3D Comfort Cradle system allows the hipbelt to pivot as you walk, improving balance on uneven terrain
  • Adjustable shoulder harness to fit your torso length
  • Plus size-specific harness and hipbelt provides a better fit for diverse sizes and shapes
  • Polygiene® Stays Fresh antimicrobial treatment on backpanel, hipbelt and harness
  • Sliding sternum strap with an integrated whistle
  • Floating lid and spindrift collar accommodates different size loads
  • Stretch mesh shove-it pocket fits a shell jacket and secures with single buckle
  • Side stretch pockets and 4 compression straps
  • 2 zippered hipbelt pockets keep small personal items handy
  • Bottom compression straps to reduce volume or hold extra gear
  • Sunglass QuickStow system holds your shades without scratching them
  • Interior Nano connect toggles let you attach a Nano 14 daypack (sold separately)
  • Maximum recommended load: 20.4kg
name: Gregory Kalmia 60 Plus Size Backpack - Women's
